channel.title: Would this take the effort?
channel.description:
I was wondering if it would take the effort to create a new framework for RSC...
I'm growing kind of tired of those crappy RSCD servers, time to bring something new out here.
If I do this, I'll make it alot easier to work with, maybe we'll be seeing more RSC servers if this works out.

item.title: Would this take the effort?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Who cares if you make something out of it? Just do it for the learning experience.

Read full topic
